channel.title: Help got some kind of fog on my serv =(
channel.description: iv been playing my server with tons of people then all of sudden... some kind of fog come's up andi did ::snowoff it turned off but now its back and i tryd it it wont turn it off how do i get it off?

item.title: Help got some kind of fog on my serv =(
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

[quote author=Click Here link=topic=106809.msg1070520#msg1070520 date=1175382286] just remove it from client.java, search for weather and remove, save compile then run and it should be gone. [/quote]

I tried that before, but i got some errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Help got some kind of fog on my serv =(

item.title: Help got some kind of fog on my serv =(

maybye restart your server or when you type ::snowoff save the data…?

Or remove from client java thingy

item.title: Help got some kind of fog on my serv =(
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Lol, type ::weatheroff

oh yeh, you may want to change the weather setting in client.java and weather.java.
